# Ko

> 🐙 A project manager.

[![License MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-red.svg)](/LICENSE)
[![Prettier](https://img.shields.io/badge/style-prettier-ff69b4.svg)](https://prettier.io/)
[![Zoe](https://img.shields.io/badge/linter-zoe-615cfd.svg?longCache=true&style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://github.com/jorgegonzalez/zoe)

## Overview

Ko is a CLI tool to manage various aspects of Node-based development.

Ko can:

_(only features with a checkmark have been implemented)_

* Backup and generate commonly used project files ✅
* Configure various project settings
* Backup globally installed Node modules
* Generate project skeletons

## Installation

```sh
yarn global add Ko
```

## Usage



### Save

```
Ko save .gitignore
Ko save .gitignore license
Ko save .gitignore=gitignore
Ko save .gitignore=gignore .editorconfig=econfig license .travis.yml=travis readme.md=readme
Ko save lib/utils.js=utils
Ko save ../.babelrc=babel
```

### Add

```
Ko add license

// Creates '.gitignore', 'license', '.editorconfig',
// 'readme.md', and '.travis.yml' in the current directory.
Ko add gignore license econfig readme travis

// Save 'utils.js' to './src/'
Ko add lib/utils

// Save '.babelrc' to '../module'
Ko add ../module/babel
```

### Group and New
```
Ko group module=license,gignore,travis,econfig,readme
Ko new module => 'Ko add license gignore travis econfig readme'
```

### Backup
```
Ko backup license gignore travis econfig readme tsc tsl

```

### Config
```
Ko config
```

### Init
```
Ko init
```
